entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:33 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -23.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
